content.heroIntro: Welcome to JADE 2, a stunning residential development by GRUPO ESMERALDA in the coveted Playa Arenal area of Calpe, Alicante. This carefully designed project offers 2 and 3-bedroom modern apartments starting from €430,000, perfectly positioned to capture the essence of Mediterranean living on the Costa Blanca. With delivery scheduled for March 2028, JADE 2 represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after coastal locations, combining contemporary design with accessible pricing and strong rental potential. The development features premium finishes, thoughtful layouts ranging from 82 to 93 square meters, and direct access to world-class amenities including the Blue Flag Arenal-Bol beach, Club de Golf Ifach, and excellent healthcare facilities. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, a holiday retreat, or an investment property, JADE 2 delivers outstanding value with the trusted reputation of GRUPO ESMERALDA backing every purchase.

locationSection.intro: Playa Arenal in Calpe is a picturesque Mediterranean destination that seamlessly blends natural beauty with modern amenities. This vibrant coastal neighborhood attracts an international community, particularly British and German expats who have established strong cultural roots here. The area is characterized by its stunning beaches, excellent local services, and convenient transport connections. Calpe itself has experienced impressive property market growth of 7% year-on-year, while remaining 20% more affordable than neighboring Jávea. The Playa Arenal location offers direct beach access with the famous Blue Flag Arenal-Bol just moments away, ensuring an enviable lifestyle. With English widely spoken in tourist areas and comprehensive healthcare facilities nearby, this location appeals to both retirees and young families seeking quality Mediterranean living.

faqs.question: Is Calpe a good place to buy property?

Excellent healthcare with English-speaking staff, international schools, and comprehensive expat support networks make integration straightforward.
